title: What to do with clothes you no longer wear
description: New services offer convenient tailoring and repurposing of clothes in a bid to make them last longer.

title: Elon Musk subpoenas Twitter founder Jack Dorsey ahead of court battle
description: The billionaire hopes Jack Dorsey will help him end his deal to buy the social media site.

title: PlayStation sued for £5bn in the UK over ‘rip-off’ games
description: The gaming firm is accused of using its market dominance to impose extra charges and drive up prices.

title: Turning e-waste into art at the University of Dundee
description: A team at the University of Edinburgh have been salvaging e-waste’s precious metals for art.
